content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (16, 28), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母は左上(3,3)近傍にいる可能性が高いため、こちらの空母BC1は安全圏を保ちつつ索敵範囲内に近づく。現在位置(16,28)から北西方向へ移動しつつ、航空部隊BSQ1とBSQ2を敵空母の可能性が高い左上エリアに向けて発艦し、広範囲に索敵を行う。これにより敵空母の早期発見を目指す。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 14, "y": 25}, "launch_target": {"x": 5, "y": 5}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=5 y=5 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=5 y=6.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "敵空母は(3,3)近傍にいるため、航空部隊の航続距離22以内で索敵可能な最も左上に近い座標を指定する。空母BC1は安全圏を保ちつつ北西方向に移動し、航空部隊BSQ1とBSQ2をそれぞれ異なる目標座標に発艦させて索敵範囲を広げる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 14, "y": 25}, "launch_target": {"x": 6, "y": 6}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (6, 6) while at (14, 25).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (15, 26), en route to target (14, 25), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (14, 25), outbound toward (6, 6), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "空母BC1は引き続き北西方向に移動し索敵範囲を広げる。BSQ1は目標座標(6,6)に向けて索敵中。BSQ2を別の索敵ポイント、例えば(7,7)に発艦させて索敵範囲をカバーし、敵空母の早期発見を狙う。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 14, "y": 25}, "launch_target": {"x": 7, "y": 7}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (7, 7) while at (14, 24).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 25), en route to target (14, 25), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (12, 21), outbound toward (6, 6), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (14, 24), outbound toward (7, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking": "空母BC1は現在位置(14,25)で停止し、索敵範囲を維持。BSQ1とBSQ2はそれぞれ目標座標(6,6)と(7,7)に向けて索敵中。敵空母発見のため、両航空部隊の索敵を継続し、敵の動きを注視する。空母は敵に発見されないよう現状維持。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 25), en route to target (14, 25), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (10, 17), outbound toward (6, 6), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (12, 20), outbound toward (7, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking": "BSQ1とBSQ2は引き続き敵空母の索敵を継続中。空母BC1は現在位置を維持し、敵に発見されないよう慎重に動く。敵の動向が不明なため、航空部隊の索敵範囲を広げるために次ターン以降、目標座標の微調整を検討する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 25), en route to target (14, 25), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (8, 13), outbound toward (6, 6), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (10, 16), outbound toward (7, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking": "航空部隊BSQ1とBSQ2は目標地点に近づいているが、まだ敵空母は発見されていない。空母BC1は現在位置を維持し、敵に発見されないよう慎重に行動。次ターンで航空部隊が目標地点に到達したら、索敵結果に応じて次の行動を決定する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

- Your squadron BSQ2: position (8, 12), outbound toward (7, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1が目標地点(6,6)に近づいているが敵空母は未発見。BSQ2も同様に(7,7)に接近中。空母BC1は安全圏を維持しつつ、索敵範囲を最大化するために北西方向へ少し移動を検討。敵の位置特定に向けて航空部隊の索敵を継続。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 13, "y": 23}, "launch_target": null}}

- Your squadron BSQ2: position (7, 8), outbound toward (7, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1は目標地点で敵空母を発見できなかったため帰還中。BSQ2は引き続き索敵中。空母BC1は安全圏を維持しつつ、索敵範囲を広げるために北西方向へ移動を継続。次にBSQ1が帰艦したら、別の目標に再発艦させて索敵範囲を拡大する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 12, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

{"thinking": "両航空部隊が帰還中で索敵結果は敵空母未発見。空母BC1は安全圏を維持しつつ、敵の動きを探るために北西方向へ更に接近。航空部隊が帰艦次第、敵空母の可能性がある左上エリアの別座標に再発艦し、索敵範囲を広げる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 19}, "launch_target": null}}
